ObjectAttribute.name: apbirthrightPopulations
ObjectAttribute.Description: Comma Separated Birthright Populations - Will be used for Birthright Role Automation

ObjectAttribute.name: manualOverride
ObjectAttribute.Description: Manual Override Entitlemnet Birthright, Privileged, and Logical Application Settings

ObjectAttribute.name: entBusApprovers
ObjectAttribute.Description: Enter a comma separated Cube Ids or WorkGroups

ObjectAttribute.name: entBusApprovalRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule can be used to override 1st Level Business Approvers

ObjectAttribute.name: additionalEntBusApprovers
ObjectAttribute.Description: Enter a comma separated Cube Ids or WorkGroups

ObjectAttribute.name: additionalEntBusApproversRule
ObjectAttribute.Description: This rule can be used to override 2nd Level Business Approvers

ObjectAttribute.name: entAppName
ObjectAttribute.Description: Either Single or Comma separated Logical Business Aplications(Shared Databases, Shared Groups, etc)
